entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this morning then becoming light early this afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Friday 31 March 2023
